pr_title: State the option to reference templates in cluster

timeline.bodyText:
May I suggest adding a link to the section in https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-template.html#pre-registered-templates to make it easier to look up the storage process?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            It is also possible to use templates already stored in the cluster state by referencing their id in the templates section.
          
          
            
            It is also possible to use <<pre-registered-templates,templates already stored>>  in the cluster state by referencing their id in the templates section.
timeline.author: cbuescher
